channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Council planted tree but someone chopped it, 28th July
item.description:

item.title: Flytipped carpet - Selborne Road adjacent to Marina House garage, 28th July
item.description:
Flytipped carpet for removal please, adjacent to Marina House garage. Why oh why is there so much flytipping in Selborne Road? (We have CCTV in Allendale Close but it has been dumped out of CCTV range.) Thank you once again!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 63-65, Denmark Hill, Camberwell, London

item.title: Rubbish, 28th July
item.description:

item.title: 80 woodbank, 28th July
item.description:
Again I’m having to report on their behalf that their green bin has been sitting there overflowing for weeks because they don’t know what rubbish does & doesn’t belong. They are putting all kinds including food , used nappies etc so obviously it’s not being emptied. Their rubbish is all over the pavement & tge green opposite
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 35, Woodbank Road, Downham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Need 1 less waste bin and 1 more recycle bin, 28th July
item.description:
The recycling is always overflowing and the waste bins are always empty - please replace one waste bin with an additional recycling bin. Also - there are disabled people in the building who cannot lift the lids on the bins - can they please be left open?
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Dalston Lane, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
